import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaLeaf, FaHandHoldingHeart, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaSearch, FaWhatsapp, FaUsers } from 'react-icons/fa'; export default function Home() { // Sample donors data - you'll replace this with actual data from your API const sampleDonors = [ { id: 1, name: "Fresh Foods Market", city: "Johannesburg", phone: "+27123456789" }, { id: 2, name: "Green Grocers", city: "Cape Town", phone: "+27876543210" }, { id: 3, name: "Organic Farms SA", city: "Durban", phone: "+27111222333" }, { id: 4, name: "Bakery Corner", city: "Pretoria", phone: "+27444555666" } ]; return (
{/* Main Hero Section */}

Nourish SA,
Eliminate Waste!

Join the Food Rescue initiative in South Africa!🇿🇦 We connect generous donors with local NGOs to ensure no good food goes to waste and everyone has access to healthy meals.

Discover Listings
{/* FIXED: Use absolute path from public folder or import */} { e.target.style.display = 'none'; // Optional: Show a placeholder if image fails to load }} />
{/* Available Donors Section */}

Our Generous Donors

{sampleDonors.map((donor) => (

{donor.name}

{donor.city}

{donor.phone && ( WhatsApp )}
))}
{/* Value Proposition / How It Works Section */}

How We Make a Difference

{/* Card 1: Reduce Waste */}

Reduce Food Waste

Prevent edible surplus food from ending up in landfills, positively impacting our environment.

{/* Card 2: Feed Communities */}

Nourish Our Community

Channel nutritious food to those in need, supporting NGOs and vulnerable families in our Communities.

{/* Card 3: Local Impact */}

Local & Direct

Connect directly with local donors and NGOs for efficient, impactful food distribution right here in South Africa.

{/* Call to Action Section */}

Ready to Make a Difference?

I'm a Donor! I'm an NGO!
); }
